name: CoreBuild
description:
CoreBuild Software is a Romanian software outsourcing company with a strong customer base both national and international. Our development team consists of experienced and eager developers which enables us to deliver high quality products and to create a professional working environment. Within CoreBuild you will encounter development professionals in .NET, iOS and Android, as well as a constant desire to innovate and surpass new technological barriers.
An excellent company to work in for passionate developers who want to establish the basis of a growing career full of possibilities.
